title: (x) Can someone tell me the font used in this logo? / 'QREN': square sans - Apex Sans {Jan}
content:
The font on the right.  
Something similar would be nice too.

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [QREN.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418090615/http:/typophile.com/files/QREN_0.png) | 71.39 KB |
author: Stingray

comments.content: Yes, but the old [Apex Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418090615/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Apex_Sans#panel=mudtyper). In Apex New, the diacritics and the figure 1 are different.
